line_1: Fall in tunes all adown the green steep, ye cascades,
line_2: No matter, no matter — content in the shades —

line_1: Shines a broad lake, or falls in deep cascades.
line_2: There the full stream, thro' intermingling glades,

line_1: For clumps and lawns and temples and cascades,
line_2: T' exchange the center of a thousand trades,
